name: the Urban Death Project: Laying Our Loved Ones to Rest
blurb: What if we could grow new life after we've died? Now we can.

name: + POOL, Tile by Tile
blurb: Like a giant strainer dropped into the river, + POOL makes it possible for everybody to swim in clean river water right here in NYC.

name: NEW WOMEN SPACE
blurb: New Women Space is a project cultivation and community event space in Brooklyn for women of all experiences.

name: RESIGN SIGNS
blurb: Let's make many many many signs that say RESIGN.

name: Blacksmiths forging bike racks for local communities
blurb: Bike racks Forged in Fire - designed and built by blacksmiths using hot iron and donated to local communities along the Erie Canal.

name: Turn the Tide on the Climate Crisis
blurb: Creating a global network of ocean sanctuaries to harness the power of the ocean

name: Heirloom Flower Preservation Garden - Creating a New Legacy
blurb: Heirloom cut flower preservation garden in the urban historic district of the First City in Kansas!

name: TruckTruck: The Mobile Design Truck
blurb: a sharable pop-up and mobile design workshop to support local creatives and teach maker skills

name: Keystone Flag: a new icon for Pennsylvania
blurb: A flag for everyday Pennsylvanians to fly with pride, and an icon we can all share.
